name: Monsters of Madness
description:
“That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.” - HP. Lovecraft

Monsters of Madness is a reference guide app to the popular board game Mansions of Madness.

** Features **

- A full collection manager which gives you the ability to select which expansions are in your collection and the rest of the app features will auto adjust to only show you things that apply to your current collection. This includes all expansions from Mansions of Madness 2nd Edition as well as the core game and expansions from the 1st edition of the game. There are also options to select which of the DLC scenarios you have at your disposal if you would like to track those as well.

- Full list of monsters from the game with their individual Awareness, Horror and Brawn stats readily available for easy reference. A small info button also highlights what each of the numbers stands for if you need a reminder at any time.

- Full list of investigators from the game with all stats listed for easy reference. You have the ability to select an investigator that will update the Actions tab to show any additional special actions that investigator may give you.

- A full action reference list organized by how common such an action would be taken in-game.
